title: weather search
description: Using the OpenWeatherMap API, the user is able to search for the current weather for a specific city, as well as see the 5-day forecast. Previous searches stay on the screen as buttons for easy access to the user's favorites.

title: shake it up
description: Use Shake It Up if you and your S.O. are constantly arguing about your plans and need someone else to decide for you. Shake It Up starts with 5 categories (shakers), containing an array of activities or ideas. Choose the category you would like, and an activity will be randomly chosen for you. If you donâ€™t like the activity given, simply, shake again, OR create your own shaker to use whenever you want.

title: employee directory
description: This is an interactive database tool used to keep track of employees. The user can sort and search by any property, as well as delete employees.

title: work day scheduler
description: Keep track of your day with this work-day scheduler. The user is able to add, edit and delete items in a specific time slot. Colors on the schedule change as the day moves on (grey for time that has passed, red for current, and green for future).

title: budget tracker
description: Use this app to keep track of your money on and offline. Simply enter your starting balance, then you can credit or debit your account. If the user is offline, their entries are still recorded and reflected when the user is back online

title: fitness tracker
description: Need something to keep track of your workouts and fitness goals? Use this app to record your sets, reps, mileage, etc. On the homepage, you can either start a new workout or continue an existing one. When you're finished, checkout your workout summary by clicking on the Dashboard tab.

title: burger logger
description: Nom Nom Nom...I love a good burger! This app is perfect for a restaurant to use during a lunch rush. Enter the name of the burger in the 'Add a Burger' section, say whether it's been devoured or not, click the 'Add Burger' button and watch it show up in the corresponding column. The user can devour or remove the burger from there.

title: note taker
description: Do you carry around sticky notes? Nor do I. With the Note Taker app, you don't need to! Simpy add a note title, then some text in the text box, and watch it show up under the saved notes column. The user is then able to edit or remove notes.

title: dog friendly denver
description: This site is for all animal lovers! Browse photos of cats and dogs, take a quiz to find out what type of animal you are, and find your forever furry friend! We used multiple APIs to make sure the user has access to all the resources they need.

title: HR Manager
description: Manage employees with ease using this Express app. You can view all employees, view by department or role, add employees, and remove employees. When you're done, toggle to the 'end app' option and you're all set!
